source.sqlReaderQuery:
with cte as 
(
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],
	[Customer Category],
	[Loading Slip No_],
	[AutoPDASO],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Last Modified On]) = 2021 and month([Last Modified On]) = 09
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],
	[Customer Category],
	[Loading Slip No_],
	[AutoPDASO],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'CHE' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - CHENNAI$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Last Modified On]) = 2021 and month([Last Modified On]) = 09
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],
	[Customer Category],
	[Loading Slip No_],
	[AutoPDASO],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'CG' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - CHHATTISGARH$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Last Modified On]) = 2021 and month([Last Modified On]) = 09
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],

where year([Last Modified On]) = 2021 and month([Last Modified On]) = 09
UNION ALL
SELECT

FROM [dbo].[BIPL - WESTBENGAL$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Last Modified On]) = 2021 and month([Last Modified On]) = 09
)
Select max([Last Modified On]) as Last_Modified_On, Site_Code from cte
group by Site_Code 
order by Site_Code asc;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
with cte as
(
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],
	[Ship-to City],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Shipment Method Code],
	[Location Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
	[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
	[Shipping Agent Code],
	[LR_RR No_],
	[LR_RR Date],
	[Vehicle No_],
	[Vehicle Type],
	[Route Code],
	[Customer Category],

	[AutoPDASO],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Shipment Header]
where year([Last Modified On]) = 2020
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Ship-to Code],
	replace([Ship-to Name],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Name],
	replace([Ship-to Address], ',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address],
	replace([Ship-to Address 2],',', ' ') as [Ship-to Address 2],

Select * from cte 
where cte.Site_Code = '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.value[0].Site_Code}'
	 and 
	 cte.[Last Modified On] > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.value[1].Last_Modified_Date}'
	 and 
	 cte.[Last Modified On] <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.value[1].Last_Modified_On}'
